artworks.title: Girl With A Pearl Earring
artworks.description: This is an oil painting by Dutch Golden Age painter Johannes Vermeer. The painting is famous for the enigmatic expression on the girl's face and the unique quality of light.

artworks.title: Sunflowers
artworks.description: A series of paintings by Vincent van Gogh. These works depict sunflowers in all stages of life and are renowned for their bold yellow colors and thick, impasto brushstrokes.

artworks.identifier: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp, 1632
artworks.title: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp
artworks.description: A work by Rembrandt housed in the Mauritshuis museum in The Hague. The painting shows Dr. Tulp explaining the musculature of the arm to medical professionals.

artworks.title: The Milkmaid
artworks.description: A painting by Johannes Vermeer, often considered a depiction of domestic virtue, simplicity, and diligence, celebrated for its subtle play of light and texture.

artworks.title: The Starry Night
artworks.description: An oil on canvas by Vincent van Gogh. Painted in June 1889, it depicts the view from the east-facing window of his asylum room at Saint-RÃ©my-de-Provence, just before sunrise, with the addition of an imaginary village.
